Hohenwerfen

castle was built between the years 
1075 and 1078 and it is considered

the sister castle to Hohensalzburg which is 
the fortress overlooking the city of salzburg

this particular castle sits on a 
peak high above the salzach valley

and it is surrounded by mountains (Austrian Alps) 
one thing to keep in mind before you visit is that

the Hohenwerfen castle is only open from april 
to november so it's not a year-round attraction
